responsibilities: Collaborate with researchers, including faculty, staff, and students, to support their scholarly work.
Offer technical expertise in research design, survey methodology, coding, and automation.
Provide tailored solutions using Qualtrics, REDCap, and other data collection tools as necessary.
Work in a vibrant and collaborative environment within a team that supports all phases of the data lifecycle for quantitative, qualitative, and geospatial research.

Partner closely with Data Services, Research Technology Services, NYU Libraries, faculty members, and researchers to handle referrals, develop services, implement technology, establish standards, collect and present usage and resource health metrics, manage resources, and oversee projects.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on supporting scholarly work, offering technical expertise in research design, and providing tailored solutions using data collection tools. While these responsibilities involve technical expertise and potentially working with data, they do not explicitly mention working with large language models or fine-tuning them for domain-specific tasks. The focus seems to be more on data lifecycle management and collaboration rather than on language model customization.
